Articles.Content:
I have searched the forums and Google to attempt to fix my issue. I have had no problems up until today. I just got back from the Mun and received about 480 Science points. I now have a total of 658.4. I spent all but 18, go into the hangar, and I am missing the parts. If I exit the hangar, I have all of my science points back. Not only that but I do not get science points from completing contracts. I do, however, received funds for completing them. Also, I do not get the "experimental" equipment when I accept a contract that requires me to test something I do not have. I will get the contract, but not the part.

I have done a complete uninstall and reinstall into a new folder and I still have the same problem.

No mods.

i7-4770K

Asus Sabertooth z87 Motherboard

16GB G.Skill RAM

500GB Samsung 840 EVO SSD

2x AMD R9 280x GPUs

Any ideas?

Thanks,

Tubesock

All I can think of from what you've said is it may be a permissions issue. Which folder is KSP in? If it's in something like Program Files, you can run into an issue where the game won't be able to save properly, which has lead to science points not updating in the past. Moving KSP to something like C:\Games will avoid the issue.

More information on permissions can be found in this sticky thread under 'windows'. If that isn't the case, posting the information stated in this sticky thread would be very helpful.
